name: One Fellow's Saw is Another's Paintbrush
name_original: One Fellow's Saw is Another's Paintbrush
description:
by Caleb Noller

This wonderfully wacky game is based on a small escape room by Max Myers - made into a painting game!

Grab your shed tools, position your paint buckets in mid air, and create dazzling three-dimensional art.

 

Instructions

  • Left click: pick up/drop item
  • Position paint buckets and leave them floating in mid air
  • Pick up tools, and run them through the paint buckets to start painting.

 

Download includes a recreated copy of the original game (by me, replicating/slightly updating Max Myers' original concept), and the spicy new painting adaptation.

See also:

  • A Visit to the Optometrist by Caleb Noller - Explore a cheese factory during a mouse plague
